special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Murasa enters, search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 2
Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, create a Scion token. [i](It’s a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”)[/i]
 Level 3
